title: New: Nautic – Fixxx
content: Nautic’s debut track, Fresh Eyes, made so much sense it was almost difficult to listen to. It was smooth as hell, dreamy and more than a little seedy at times. Nothing can be that smooth. Nothing. Well, Bullion, Laura Groves and Young Turks’ Tic are back, (this time without slime), and they’ve more than delivered on this ‘difficult second track’. The sound is more expansive, proving that sonically at least, the group have more than a little scope. Plus the violins at the end are to fucking die for.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d24
